game.title: Quest for the Sunken City
game.objective: Recover the sunken treasures of the Mayans.
game.description: The ancient Mayan sunken city holds valuable artifacts. Your mission is to locate it and return them to the museum.
game.reward: Discovery of historical artefacts and a prestige reward

task.objective: Discover the underwater entrance in the nearby lagoon.
task.description: The entrance is hidden beneath the waves. You must dive and find it.

task.objective: Overcome the sea creatures guarding the ruins.
task.description: The sea creatures are protective. Solve their puzzles to proceed.

task.objective: Extract and transport the artifacts to the museum.
task.description: Once you reach the city, carefully extract the treasures and bring them back.
